text: Wall Street is a 1987 American crime drama movie directed by Oliver Stone. It stars Michael Douglas, Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah, Martin Sheen, Eli Wallach, Terence Stamp, and Hal Holbrook. It was released on December 11, 1987 to very positive reviews. It was followed by a sequel, Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps. == Other websites == * Category:1987 crime movies Category:1987 drama movies Category:1980s crime drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Manhattan in fiction Category:Movies directed by Oliver Stone Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies about businesspeople Category:Trading movies Category:Movies about corruption
title: Wall Street (1987 movie)
